chat.ticex_annihilation.recall: §e[SYSTEM]§f Recall sequence initiated. All units returning.§r
chat.ticex_annihilation.no_weapons: §c[FATAL ERROR]§f Weapon bay empty. Combat impossible.§r
message.ticex_annihilation.recall: >> §eRecall Complete:§f Return sequence finished. Diagnosis: All systems green.
message.ticex_annihilation.no_weapons: >> §4Error:§f No weapon units detected. Please load via SATC Link.
item.ticex_annihilation.psycho_frame.des: An unknown material that physicalizes the light of the human heart. It holds enough power to push back even a massive asteroid.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.eternal_supp: The Psycho-Frame can transcend even the walls of dimensions... Human will makes the impossible possible!
Spacetime interference via Psycho-Frame. Nullifies resource consumption of all SATC-linked weaponry by supplying from other dimensions.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.psycho_funne: Places all projectiles (including magic and bullets) under Psycommu control, granting them auto-tracking capabilities.
Resonating with pure white crystals, 'fangs' that ignore space itself pierce the enemy.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.psycho_shard: This is nothing but 'light'... O Psycho-Frame that moved the stars, now bring judgment upon them!
Freezes surrounding space in orange despair, ceasing all functional activities.
Life... life is power! Life is what supports this entire universe!
Seizes and enhances all incoming attacks, launching them back at the source.
modifier.ticex_annihilation.long_range_l: Extends the range of firearms and magic by 5x. Completely nullifies bullet spread and damage falloff.
item.ticex_annihilation.bio_sensor.desc: An interface that translates brainwaves into machine code, pushing performance to the limit. Some say it can even amplify the human heart...
description.ticex_annihilation.minofsky_: Diffuses Minofsky particles to disable electronics.
description.ticex_annihilation.nj_short: Suppresses nuclear thermal reactions within range.
